DOC.criteria: Healthy Male female computer literate subject ( able use computers/related technology efficiently ) age group 1840 year age . Subject moderate caffeine consumer . All subject predominantly right hand . Subject body mass index ( BMI ) ≥18.5 < 25.00 kg/m2 . Subjects Generalized Anxiety Disorder Screener ( GAD7 ) score ≤ 7 . Subjects screen depression Patient Health Questionnaire9 ( PHQ9 ) score ≤ 14 . Subjects score least 50 ± 20 two three reading Jin Fan 's Attention Network Test ( ANT ) version 1.3.0 24 hr caffeine abstinence perform interval 3060 min . Subject willing refrain consume caffeine caffeinecontaining product 24 hr prior enrollment study prior visit site . Subject agree refrain use turmeric , ginger , cardamom , lemon grass , galangal , beetle leave , beetle nut contain product like thai food , tea masala , thai sauce , mouth freshener , paan , etc day prior clinic visit . Subject willing refrain vigorous physical activity 12 hr prior clinic visit . Subject complete least 78 hour sleep night prior clinic visit . Subject nonsmoker . Female subject currently menstrual period include last day menstrual flow . Female Subjects consume oral contraceptive include study washout period 7 day willing stop use study opt barrier contraceptive method . Subjects unable abstain caffeine contain product 24 hr . Subjects suffer primary secondary insomnia with/ without active treatment . Subjects Generalized Anxiety Disorder Screener ( GAD7 ) score > 7 . Subjects Personal health Questionnaire Score > 14 . Subjects suffer type II Diabetes Mellitus . Subject health condition would prevent him/her fulfil study requirement judge investigator basis medical history routine laboratory test result .
